Name: Black Rose
Ingredients: 3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
FINE STRAIN into chilled glass. (No ice in the glass.)
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Nutrition: One serving of Black Rose contains 157 calories
